crown.name: CSK_Module_IODDInterpreter
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_IODDInterpreter
crown.desc: Module to interpret IODD files for further use by CSK_Module_MultiIOLinkSMI, CSK_Module_MultiIOLinkRestMaster and for your customized app. + {empty} + The main externally useful features are following: + {empty} + **1. IODD Files upload and interpretation** + Use "addIODDFile" function to interpret the IODD XML file. + Or use "Upload IODD XML" button in UI and select XML file to upload. + IODD Files (.xml) and their interpretations (.json) are stored in public/IODDFiles. + To delete IODD file from internal memory, use "setSelectedIODDToHandle" and "deleteIODD" + {empty} + **2. IODD File - device match check** + Use "findIODDMatchingProductName" and "findIODDMatchingVendorIdDeviceIdVersion" to check if there is a loaded IODD file that matches your device already. + {empty} + **3. Multiple instances handling** + **Instance ID is a string name** to make it easier for external use since this module might be used by several other modules / applications. + Assign IODD file to be used by the instance via "setSelectedIODD". Use "addInstance", "setInstanceName" and "deleteInstance" to create, rename and delete the instance. + {empty} + **4. Dynamic tables representing process data and parameters** + All parameters and process data are devided in two sets: + a) Read Data - consists of Process Data In table and Parameters (read only + read/write) table + b) Write Data - consists of Process Data Out table and Parameters (write only + read/write) table + {empty} + The rows of the tables can be selected to form a set of data (**message**) to be read or written from/to the device. + When a row of the table is selected, the following events are triggered to provide new set of data externally: + a) Read Data - "OnNewReadDataJsonTemplateAndInfo" + b) Write Data - "OnNewWriteDataJsonTemplateAndInfo" + {empty} + **5. Process data structure selection** + Process data structure of IO-Link device might be variable. The structure depends on a value of some parameter. In case process data is variable, use following: + - "getProcessDataConditionList" - to get list of possible options + - "changeProcessDataStructureOptionName" or "changeProcessDataStructureOptionValue" to change structure with string name or parameter's value + {empty} + When the process data structure is changed, the respective process data tables are updated and selected process data in the existing messages is reset. + {empty} + **6. Data point information** + Module can provide chunks of IODD file in JSON format to describe some datapoints you need. Use the following functions to get information about datapoints: + - "getProcessDataInInfo" - process data in (with current process data structure option) + - "getProcessDataOutInfo" - process data out (with current process data structure option) + - "getParameterDataPointInfo" - any parameter with specified index and subindex + - "getProcessDataConditionInfo" - parameter responsible for changing the process data structure (if it is variable) +

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistendData module are available.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewCalloutValue
event.desc: Event to notify a value of callout in UI.

event.name: OnNewCalloutType
event.desc: Event to notify a type of callout in UI.

event.name: OnNewReadParametersTableContent
event.desc: Event to fill the read parameters dynamic table in UI.

event.name: OnNewWriteParametersTableContent
event.desc: Event to fill the write parameters dynamic table in UI.

event.name: OnNewProcessDataInTableContent
event.desc: Event to fill the process data in dynamic table in UI.

event.name: OnNewProcessDataOutTableContent
event.desc: Event to fill the process data out dynamic table in UI.

event.name: OnNewProcessDataStructureOptionsDropdownContent
event.desc: Event to share list of process data structure options if process data is variable.

param.desc: JSON object with list of process data structure options.
param.name: ProcessDataStructureOptionsDropdownContent

event.name: OnNewSelectedProcessDataStructureOption
event.desc: Event to notify the selected process data structure option if it is variable.

event.name: isProcessDataStructureVariable
event.desc: Event to notify if process data is variable to show additional settings in UI.

param.desc: True if process data is variable.
param.name: IsProcessDataStructureVariable

event.name: OnNewListIntances
event.desc: Event to share the list of all instances names.

param.desc: List of all names in JSON format.
param.name: jsonIntancesList

event.name: OnNewSelectedInstance
event.desc: Event to notify the selected instance name.

event.name: isInstanceSelected
event.desc: Event to notify if any instance is selected to show additional settings in UI.

event.name: OnNewInstanceName
event.desc: Event to show the name of selected instance in UI.

event.name: OnNewSelectedIODDToHandle
event.desc: Event to notify the selected IODD name of a file to be edited (deleted).

event.name: OnNewListIODD
event.desc: Event to share list of all loaded IODD files.

param.desc: List of all names in JSON format.
param.name: jsonIODDList

event.name: OnNewSelectedIODD
event.desc: Event to notify the IODD name used by selected instance.

event.name: OnNewReadDataJsonTemplateAndInfo
event.desc: Event to notify when selected read datapoints (process data in and parameters) has changed. Might be useful externally.

param.desc: JSON template of new combined read message.
param.name: jsonTemplate

event.name: OnNewWriteDataJsonTemplateAndInfo
event.desc: Event to notify when selected write datapoints (process data out and parameters) has changed. Might be useful externally.

param.desc: JSON template of new combined write message.
param.name: jsonTemplate

event.name: OnIODDListChanged
event.desc: Event to notify if IODD file was deleted or a new IODD file was successfully uploaded.

param.desc: New list with standartised names of available IODDs.
param.name: listIODD

event.name: OnNewStatusCSKStyle
event.desc: Notify UI style to use for CSK modules.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleVersion
event.desc: Notify version of module.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/device boot up.

function.name: pageCalledInstances
function.desc: Function to register "On Resume" of the ModuleName_Model UI ( (only helper function).

return.desc: Empty string.
return.name: empty

function.name: uploadFinished
function.desc: Function called when IODD file upload is finished in UI.

function.name: writeParameterRowSelectedUI
function.desc: Function to process the selected row in write parameters dynamic table in UI.

function.name: processDataInRowSelected
function.desc: Function to process the selected row in process data in dynamic table that was selected in another CSK module.

param.desc: Optional prefix to be removed from column names.
param.name: prefix

return.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
return.name: jsonTemplate

return.desc: JSON object with datapoints infos.
return.name: jsonDataInfo

function.name: processDataOutRowSelected
function.desc: Function to process the selected row in process data out dynamic table in UI.

param.desc: Optional prefix to be reemoved from column names.
param.name: prefix

return.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
return.name: jsonTemplate

return.desc: JSON object with datapoints infos.
return.name: jsonDataInfo

function.name: addIODDFile
function.desc: Add a new IODD file to be interpreted. Returns success of interpretation and new internal name of IODD file created according to IODD file name standard.

param.desc: Path to a temporary IODD file. The file will be deleted after interpretation attempt.
param.name: path

return.desc: Interpretation success.
return.name: success

return.desc: If interpretation is successful, returns a standartized IODD file name that is used for the uploaded IODD file. Else returns a reason of interpretation failure.
return.name: result

function.name: findIODDMatchingProductName
function.desc: Checks if there is a loaded IODD file for the device with matching product name.

return.desc: True if the matching file is found.
return.name: success

return.desc: Name of IODD file if match is found.
return.name: result

function.name: findIODDMatchingVendorIdDeviceIdVersion
function.desc: Checks if there is a loaded IODD file for the device with matching vendor ID, device ID and (optional) IODD version.

return.desc: True if matching IODD file is found.
return.name: success

return.desc: IODD file name if match is found.
return.name: result

function.name: changeProcessDataStructureOptionName
function.desc: Change process data structure of IODD instance to start using new process data desciption internally.

param.desc: String process data structure name option from IODD file.
param.name: newPDStructureOptionName

function.name: changeProcessDataStructureOptionValue
function.desc: Change process data structure of IODD instance to start using new process data desciption internally.

param.desc: Process data structure value option from IODD file.
param.name: newPDStructureOptionValue

function.name: getProcessDataConditionInfo
function.desc: Get IODD description of a parameter resposible for changing of process data structure if it is variable.

return.desc: JSON object with description of index or subindex of the parameter.
return.name: jsonProcessDataConditionInfo

function.name: getProcessDataInInfo
function.desc: Get IODD description of process data in (for reading from device).

return.desc: JSON object with description of process data in.
return.name: jsonProcessDataInInfo

function.name: getProcessDataOutInfo
function.desc: JSON object with description of process data out (for writing to device).

return.desc: JSON object with description of process data out.
return.name: jsonProcessDataOutInfo

function.name: deleteInstance
function.desc: Delete the selected IODD instance.

function.name: setInstanceName
function.desc: Function to change the instance id (name).

param.desc: New unique name of the selected instance.
param.name: newInstanceName

function.name: getIODDList
function.desc: Get list of loaded IODD files.

return.desc: String array with names of loaded IODD files.
return.name: ioddList

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Create a new IODD instance with default instance ID (string name).

function.name: setSelectedIODD
function.desc: Set IODD file used in the selected instance.

function.name: deleteIODD
function.desc: Delete IODD file from internal memory. Deletes all IODD instances that use this file as well.

return.desc: Success of deleting.
return.name: success

return.desc: Reason if deleting failed.
return.name: result

function.name: setSelectedIODDToHandle
function.desc: Set IODD to edit (delete).

function.name: pageCalledReadData
function.desc: Function to register "On Resume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: pageCalledWriteData
function.desc: Function to register "On Resume" of the ModuleName_Model UI ( (only helper function).

return.desc: Empty string.
return.name: empty

function.name: getSelectedReadParameters
function.desc: Get table with selected parameters datapoints for reading.

return.desc: JSON object with information about selected datapoints.
return.name: jsonSelectedReadParameters

function.name: getSelectedWriteParameters
function.desc: Get table with selected parameters datapoints for writing.

return.desc: JSON object with information about selected datapoints.
return.name: jsonSelectedWriteParameters

function.name: getSelectedProcessDataIn
function.desc: Get table with selected datapoints of process data in.

return.desc: JSON object with information about selected datapoints.
return.name: jsonSelectedProcessDataIn

function.name: getSelectedProcessDataOut
function.desc: Get table with selected datapoints of process data out.

return.desc: JSON object with information about selected datapoints.
return.name: jsonSelectedProcessDataOut

function.name: getIsProcessDataVariable
function.desc: Check if process data structure of the selected IODD file is variable or not.

return.desc: True if process data structure is variable.
return.name: isVariable

function.name: getProcessDataConditionList
function.desc: Get list of process data structure options.

return.desc: JSON list of options.
return.name: jsonProcessDataConditionList

function.name: getProcessDataConditionNameFromValue
function.desc: Get process data struccture option name matching the value of the parameter responsible for changing the structure.

return.desc: Name of the process data structure option.
return.name: conditionName

function.name: getProcessDataConditionValueFromName
function.desc: Get value of the parameter responsible for changing the structure matching the process data struccture option name.

param.desc: Name of the process data structure option.
param.name: conditionName

return.desc: Value of the parameter.
return.name: conditionValue

function.name: setReadSelectedData
function.desc: Set selected read data datapoints externally both for process data in and parameters.

param.desc: JSON object with selected data points for process data (ProcessData) and for parameters (Parameters).
param.name: jsonReadDataInfo

function.name: setWriteSelectedData
function.desc: Set selected read data datapoints externally both for process data out and parameters.

param.desc: JSON object with selected data points for process data (ProcessData) and for parameters (Parameters).
param.name: jsonWriteDataInfo

function.name: getParameterDataPointInfo
function.desc: Get IODD description of a single parameter.

return.desc: JSON object with description of index or subindex of the parameter. Nil if the parameter does not exist.
return.name: jsonDataPointInfo

function.name: processDataInRowSelectedUI
function.desc: Function to process the selected row of process data in dynamic table in UI.

function.name: readParameterRowSelectedUI
function.desc: Function to process the selected row of read parameters dynamic table in UI.

function.name: processDataOutRowSelectedUI
function.desc: Function to process the selected row of process data out dynamic table in UI.

function.name: readParameterRowSelected
function.desc: Function to process the selected row of read parameters dynamic table in UI of external app.

param.desc: Optional prefix to be removed from column names.
param.name: prefix

return.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
return.name: jsonTemplate

return.desc: JSON object with datapoints infos.
return.name: jsonDataInfo

function.name: writeParameterRowSelected
function.desc: Function to process the selected row of write parameters dynamic table in UI of external app.

param.desc: Optional prefix to be removed from column names.
param.name: prefix

return.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
return.name: jsonTemplate

return.desc: JSON object with datapoints infos.
return.name: jsonDataInfo

function.name: getReadDataTableContents
function.desc: Function to get content information of the selected read data.

param.desc: Optional prefix to be removed from column names.
param.name: prefix

return.desc: JSON content of process data in table.
return.name: processDataTableContent

return.desc: JSON content of read parameters table.
return.name: parameterTableContent

function.name: getWriteDataTableContents
function.desc: Function to get content information of the selected write data.

param.desc: Optional prefix to be removed from column names.
param.name: prefix

return.desc: JSON content of process data out table.
return.name: processDataTableContent

return.desc: JSON content of write parameters table.
return.name: parameterTableContent

function.name: copyInstanceSelectedTable
function.desc: Function to copy the selected tables content from one instance to another. Can be used to speed up integration.

function.name: loadInstancesListParameters
function.desc: Function to load only instances that belong to some sensor that is being loaded in external app.

function.name: sendInstancesListParameters
function.desc: Function to save only instances that belong to some sensor that is being saved in external app.

param.desc: List of the instances that belong to the sensor
param.name: instancesList

function.name: selectAllReadParameters
function.desc: Function to select or deselect all availalbe read parameters of the sensor.

param.desc: True for selecting, false for deselecting.
param.name: state

param.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
param.name: jsonTemplate

function.name: selectAllWriteParameters
function.desc: Function to select or deselect all availalbe write parameters of the sensor.

param.desc: True for selecting, false for deselecting.
param.name: state

param.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
param.name: jsonTemplate

function.name: selectAllProcessDataIn
function.desc: Function to select or deselect all availalbe process data in datapoints the sensor.

param.desc: True for selecting, false for deselecting.
param.name: state

param.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
param.name: jsonTemplate

function.name: selectAllProcessDataOut
function.desc: Function to select or deselect all availalbe process data out datapoints the sensor.

param.desc: True for selecting, false for deselecting.
param.name: state

param.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
param.name: jsonTemplate

function.name: pasteReadDataMessage
function.desc: Function to paste the copied tables content of read data (both process data in and read parameters) to the selected instance. Can be used to speed up integration. The "copyReadDataMessage" function must be used before.

param.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
param.name: jsonTemplate

function.name: copyReadDataMessage
function.desc: Function to copy the selected tables content of read data (both process data in and read parameters) of the selected instance. Can be used to speed up integration. The "pasteReadDataMessage" function must be used afterwards.

function.name: pasteWriteDataMessage
function.desc: Function to paste the copied tables content of write data (both process data out and write parameters) to the selected instance. Can be used to speed up integration. The "copyWriteDataMessage" function must be used before.

param.desc: JSON template of new combined message.
param.name: jsonTemplate

function.name: copyWriteDataMessage
function.desc: Function to copy the selected tables content of write data (both process data out and write parameters) of the selected instance. Can be used to speed up integration. The "pasteWriteDataMessage" function must be used afterwards.

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

return.desc: Success to load parameters.
return.name: success

function.name: getParameters
function.desc: Function to get all parameters of the client in JSON format.

return.desc: JSON string with all parameters.
return.name: jsonParameters

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

param.desc: [Optional] Set to TRUE if the data should NOT be saved immediately after sending.
param.name: noDataSave

function.name: getStatusModuleActive
function.desc: Function to get status if module is active.
